title: 657: CRYPTO EXPERTS PREDICT BITCOIN PRICE RISING TO $318,417 - HERE’S WHEN!!!!!
description:
A panel of Crypto experts has predicted that Bitcoin will rise to $318K by Dec. 2025. The most bullish expert believes that BTC will reach $160,000 by the end of the year. Meanwhile, 54% of them think that hyperbitcoinization will happen by 2050.

Furthermore, the “Panelists predict that by December 2030, the price of bitcoin will go up to a whopping $4,287,591 per BTC. 

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
